parameter.name: nestedSearchTerm
parameter.value: computer AND (apple OR macintosh OR jobs)

parameter.name: searchQuery
parameter.value: KE war Or SU soldiers And TX weapons Not TI peace

parameter.name: limitByQueryForNews
parameter.value: ACID (14223820) and PU 'The New York Times' and SU 'United States'

parameter.name: limitByQueryForMagazines
parameter.value: ACID 14223813 NOT (RE Y OR ACID 14223278) and PU 'American Libraries' and TY 'Brief article' and SU 'Book reviews'

parameter.name: limitByQueryForImages
parameter.value: DGID 14223265 NOT ACID (14186762 OR 14170065 OR 14170008 OR 14170029) and TY 'Photograph' and SU 'American soldiers'

parameter.name: linksInResearchGuide
parameter.value: How to Cite a Source,How to Organize a Report,How to Build an Argument,How to Write a Conclusion,How to Write a Thesis Statement,How to Create a Visual,How to Footnote,Distinguishing Fact from Opinion and Bias from Reason,Between Primary and Secondary Sources,Evaluating Information Sources,Review the Author's/Publisher's Credentials and Affiliations,Identify the Article's Supporting Material,Student Resource Center and Critical Thinking
